title: Budget deficit and the foreign exchange market

content.question: The United States government is running a budget deficit. What will most likely happen to the United States dollar in the foreign exchange market?

choices.label: Appreciate because interest rates will increase.
Depreciate because interest rates will decrease.
Appreciate because interest rates will decrease.
Depreciate because interest rates will increase.
Not change because the budget deficit has no effect on the exchange rate.

content.answer: Appreciate because interest rates will increase.
